ro.top.proxy

Interface NotificationProxy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface NotificationProxy
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This proxy expose the basic operations for manipulating a topic

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dataNotifyTopic(java.lang.Object data, java.lang.String name)
      Send this data to all subscribers of specified topic
      void deleteTopic(java.lang.String nume)
      Deletes the specified topic, without notifying the subscribers that they were unsubscribed
      void deleteTopic(java.lang.String nume, boolean notifySubscribers)
      Deletes the specified topic, and may be notifying all the subscribers that they were unsubscribed
      void deleteTopic(java.lang.String nume, java.lang.Object data)
      Deletes the specified topic, notifying all the subscribers with the specified data that they were unsubscribed
      boolean exists(java.lang.String topicName)
      Tests if the specified topic exists
      int getSubscribersCount(java.lang.String name) 
      void notifyTopic(java.lang.String name)
      Notifies all the subscribers of this topic that something happened
      java.lang.String registerClient(java.lang.String clientSocket)
      Registers the calling client, allocating an auto-generate clientId through which this server will reach the client in the future.
      void subscribe(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String clientId)
      Subscribe the client to the specified topic.
      void unregisterClient(java.lang.String clientId)
      Unregisters the client identified by the given client id
      void unsubscribe(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String clientId)
      Unsubscribe the client from the specified topic.

                 java.lang.String clientId)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        nume - the name of the topic
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        TopicDoesNotExistException - - if the topic does not exist

          throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Throws:

      • deleteTopic

        void deleteTopic(java.lang.String nume,
                 java.lang.Object data)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deletes the specified topic, notifying all the subscribers with the specified data that they were unsubscribed
        Parameters:
        nume - the name of the topic
        data - data for the subscribers
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        TopicDoesNotExistException - - if the topic does not exist

        boolean exists(java.lang.String topicName)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Tests if the specified topic exists
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true - if the topic exists, false otherwise
